verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Oh God our creator,
we bow before
you in homage
and songs of praise
presenting our
offerings to you. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We are presenting to
you bread and wine,
receive our gifts and
make them sacred.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Take our hearts almighty
God transform us,
that God we may
offer sacred gift.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
May our souls be pure
oh God and holy,
may all our sacrifice
be sacred.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
We present the gift
of food and money,
oh God bless the
works of all our hand.
